author: Anthony Spadafora
title: "Corona antivirus" infects victims with malware
description: Malwarebytes has discovered a new scam which uses fake antivirus software to infect users' computers with the BlackNET RAT.
content:
Cybercriminals continue to leverage the ongoing coronavirus outbreak for their own gain by launching numerous scam campaigns which use Covid-19 as a lure to trick users into installing a variety of malware and data stealers.
In the latest scam, discovered by… [+2088 chars]
